Class UizaPlayerManagerV3

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.loitp.uzv3.view.rl.video.UZPlayerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class UizaPlayerManagerV3
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource.MediaSourceFactory, com.github.rubensousa.previewseekbar.base.PreviewLoader
    Manages the ExoPlayer, the IMA plugin and all video playback.
